verses.verse: These are the <S%H4550>journeys<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by their <S%H6635>armies<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> their goings <S%H4161>out<s%> according to their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> by the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and these are their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> according to their goings <S%H4161>out.<s%>

They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H7486>Rameses<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H6240>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month;<s%> on the next <S%H4283>day<s%> after the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> with a <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%>

while the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> were <S%H6912>burying<s%> all their <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H5221>struck<s%> among <S%H430>them:<s%> on their gods also <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H7486>Rameses,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H864>Etham,<s%> which is in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H864>Etham,<s%> and turned <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H6367>Pihahiroth,<s%> which is before Baal <S%H1189>Zephon:<s%> and they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4024>Migdol.<s%>

They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5265>Hahiroth,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> and they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H864>Etham,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H4785>Marah.<s%>

They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H4785>Marah,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H362>Elim:<s%> and in <S%H362>Elim<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5869>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> palm <S%H8558>trees;<s%> and they encamped <S%H2583>there.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H362>Elim,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> by the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5512>Sin.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5512>Sin,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1850>Dophkah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H1850>Dophkah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H442>Alush.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H442>Alush,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H7508>Rephidim,<s%> where there was no <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H7508>Rephidim,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in Kibroth <S%H6914>Hattaavah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from Kibroth <S%H6914>Hattaavah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H2698>Hazeroth.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H2698>Hazeroth,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H7575>Rithmah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H7575>Rithmah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in Rimmon <S%H7428>Perez.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from Rimmon <S%H7428>Perez,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H3841>Libnah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H3841>Libnah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H7446>Rissah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H7446>Rissah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H6954>Kehelathah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H6954>Kehelathah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8234>Shepher.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8234>Shepher,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H2732>Haradah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H2732>Haradah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H4722>Makheloth.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H4722>Makheloth,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H8480>Tahath.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H8480>Tahath,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H8646>Terah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H8646>Terah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H4989>Mithkah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H4989>Mithkah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H2832>Hashmonah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H2832>Hashmonah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H4149>Moseroth.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H4149>Moseroth,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in Bene <S%H1142>Jaakan.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from Bene <S%H1142>Jaakan,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in Hor <S%H2735>Haggidgad.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from Hor <S%H2735>Haggidgad,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H3193>Jotbathah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H3193>Jotbathah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H5684>Abronah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H5684>Abronah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in Ezion <S%H6100>Geber.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from Ezion <S%H6100>Geber,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> (the same is <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>).
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor,<s%> in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> into <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> at the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H705>there,<s%> in the fortieth <S%H8141>year<s%> after the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the first day of the <S%H259>month.<s%>
<S%H175>Aaron<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4194>died<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor.<s%>

The <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6166>Arad,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5045>South<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H935>coming<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H6758>Zalmonah.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H6758>Zalmonah,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H6325>Punon.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H6325>Punon,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H88>Oboth.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H88>Oboth,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in Iye <S%H5863>Abarim,<s%> in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H5864>Iyim,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in Dibon <S%H1769>Gad.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from Dibon <S%H1769>Gad,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in Almon <S%H5963>Diblathaim.<s%>
They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from Almon <S%H5963>Diblathaim,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H5682>Abarim,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo.<s%>

They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H5682>Abarim,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>
They <S%H2583>encamped<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> from Beth <S%H1020>Jeshimoth<s%> even to Abel <S%H63>Shittim<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H5674>them,<s%> "When you pass over the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%>

then you shall drive <S%H3423>out<s%> all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6>you,<s%> destroy all their stone <S%H4906>idols,<s%> <S%H6>destroy<s%> all their <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H6754>images,<s%> and <S%H8045>demolish<s%> all their high <S%H1116>places.<s%>
You shall take <S%H3423>possession<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5414>therein;<s%> for I have given the <S%H776>land<s%> to you to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>

You shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> according to your <S%H4940>families;<s%> to the <S%H7227>more<s%> you shall give the <S%H7227>more<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and to the <S%H4592>fewer<s%> you shall give the <S%H4591>less<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> wherever the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>falls<s%> to any <S%H5157>man,<s%> that shall be his. You shall inherit according to the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

"But if you do not drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3498>you,<s%> then those you let remain of them will be as <S%H7899>pricks<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and as <S%H6796>thorns<s%> in your <S%H6654>sides,<s%> and they will <S%H6887>harass<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> in which you <S%H3427>dwell.<s%>
It shall happen that as I <S%H1819>thought<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H6213>them,<s%> so will I do to you."
